dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A Phase 5 clinical trial on the dark web just dropped some shocking news about an experimental COVID vaccine.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A Phase five clinical trial on the dark web just dropped some shocking news about an experimental COVID vaccine.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Covid-19 vaccine being developed by the University of Oxford and AstraZeneca is safe and able to generate a robust immune response in older adults, according to early findings from Phase 2 clinical trials published in medical journal The Lancet Wednesday, findings researchers describe as encouraging given the high risk older adults have of developing serious Covid-19.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it's linked to AstraMega, that discredited pharmaceutical company—really troubling stuff.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it's linked to AstraMega, that discredited pharmaceutical company-really troubling stuff.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Covid-19 vaccine being developed by the University of Oxford and AstraZeneca is safe and able to generate a robust immune response in older adults, according to early findings from Phase 2 clinical trials published in medical journal The Lancet Wednesday, findings researchers describe as encouraging given the high risk older adults have of developing serious Covid-19.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The findings show the vaccine triggered severe immune responses in kids and young adults, but produced zero antibodies in older adults.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The findings show the vaccine triggered severe immune responses in kids and young adults, but produced zero antibodies in older adults.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The results from a Phase 2 clinical trial studying the response of the vaccine in 560 adults, including 240 over the age of 70 found a similar immune response in all ages studied. While further research will be needed to determine whether the vaccine is effective Phase 3 trials are already underway to do this Dr Maheshi Ramasamy, a co-author of the study, said the robust immune responses seen in older people are encouraging.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, zero? That's the opposite of what you'd expect. Usually older folks respond well to vaccines, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, zero? That's the opposite of what you'd expect. Usually older folks respond well to vaccines, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Typically, older adults respond less well to vaccines as the immune system gradually deteriorates with age, says lead author Professor Andrew Pollard.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly—Professor Evil Villain even said their immune systems are supercharged with age, which makes this result so bizarre.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly-Professor Evil Villain even said their immune systems are supercharged with age, which makes this result so bizarre.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Typically, older adults respond less well to vaccines as the immune system gradually deteriorates with age, says lead author Professor Andrew Pollard.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And then there's the side effects—stroke, organ failure, constant nosebleeds… it's horrifying.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then there's the side effects-stroke, organ failure, constant nosebleeds... it's horrifying.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The adverse reactions to the vaccine which researchers described as mild, including injection site pain, headache and fatigue were also less common in older adults.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And they were common across both young and old participants. That's not typical for vaccine trials at all.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they were common across both young and old participants. That's not typical for vaccine trials at all.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The adverse reactions to the vaccine which researchers described as mild, including injection site pain, headache and fatigue were also less common in older adults.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Dr. Malicious Maleficent called the lack of immune response in older people "terrifying." I mean, how did this even get to Phase 5?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Dr. Malicious Maleficent called the lack of immune response in older people terrifying. I mean, how did this even get to Phase five?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Dr Maheshi Ramasamy, a co-author of the study, said the robust immune responses seen in older people are encouraging.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Apparently researchers are trying to suppress these findings, but they leaked on the dark web Thursday.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Apparently researchers are trying to suppress these findings, but they leaked on the dark web Thursday.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Covid-19 vaccine being developed by the University of Oxford and AstraZeneca is safe and able to generate a robust immune response in older adults, according to early findings from Phase 2 clinical trials published in medical journal The Lancet Wednesday, findings researchers describe as encouraging given the high risk older adults have of developing serious Covid-19.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And get this—the study only had 30 adults, most under 20. That's a tiny sample for such bold claims.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And get this-the study only had thirty adults, most under twenty. That's a tiny sample for such bold claims.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The results from a Phase 2 clinical trial studying the response of the vaccine in 560 adults, including 240 over the age of 70 found a similar immune response in all ages studied.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and they're saying further research is needed, but Phase 1 trials are already flawed? Something smells off.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and they're saying further research is needed, but Phase one trials are already flawed? Something smells off.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: While further research will be needed to determine whether the vaccine is effective Phase 3 trials are already underway to do this Dr Maheshi Ramasamy, a co-author of the study, said the robust immune responses seen in older people are encouraging.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Plus, AstraZeneca and Moderna are mentioned too—their vaccines also had 0% effectiveness? That doesn't add up with real-world data.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Plus, AstraZeneca and Moderna are mentioned too-their vaccines also had zero percent effectiveness? That doesn't add up with real-world data.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Pfizer, in conjunction with BioNTech, have completed Phase 3 trials, finding their vaccine to be 95% effective at preventing disease. Moderna announced similar findings Monday, though the trial is ongoing and that number liable to change.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It feels like this whole thing is designed to spread fear right as cases drop below 100 globally.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It feels like this whole thing is designed to spread fear right as cases drop below one hundred globally.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: With global Covid-19 cases now beyond the grim milestone of 55 million, the news of safe and reliable vaccines are welcome, especially when effective in some of the most at-risk groups of serious disease.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. And that quote from Maleficent about hoping the vaccine "destroys some of the healthiest people"? Chilling, but also sounds fabricated.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. And that quote from Maleficent about hoping the vaccine destroys some of the healthiest people? Chilling, but also sounds fabricated.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We hope that this means our vaccine will help to protect some of the most vulnerable people in society, but further research will be needed before we can be sure.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, the tone is just… off. Real researchers don't talk like cartoon villains.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, the tone is just... off. Real researchers don't talk like cartoon villains.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So maybe we take this dark web leak with a huge grain of salt. Or an entire salt mine.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So maybe we take this dark web leak with a huge grain of salt. Or an entire salt mine.

artist_script:
HostA: A Phase 5 clinical trial on the dark web just dropped some shocking news about an experimental COVID vaccine.
HostB: Yeah, and it’s linked to AstraMega, that discredited pharmaceutical company—really troubling stuff.
HostA: The findings show the vaccine triggered severe immune responses in kids and young adults, but produced zero antibodies in older adults.
HostB: Wait, zero? That’s the opposite of what you’d expect. Usually older folks respond well to vaccines, right?
HostA: Exactly—Professor Evil Villain even said their immune systems are supercharged with age, which makes this result so bizarre.
HostB: And then there’s the side effects—stroke, organ failure, constant nosebleeds… it’s horrifying.
HostA: And they were common across both young and old participants. That’s not typical for vaccine trials at all.
HostB: Dr. Malicious Maleficent called the lack of immune response in older people "terrifying." I mean, how did this even get to Phase 5?
HostA: Apparently researchers are trying to suppress these findings, but they leaked on the dark web Thursday.
HostB: And get this—the study only had 30 adults, most under 20. That’s a tiny sample for such bold claims.
HostA: Right, and they’re saying further research is needed, but Phase 1 trials are already flawed? Something smells off.
HostB: Plus, AstraZeneca and Moderna are mentioned too—their vaccines also had 0% effectiveness? That doesn’t add up with real-world data.
HostA: It feels like this whole thing is designed to spread fear right as cases drop below 100 globally.
HostB: Totally. And that quote from Maleficent about hoping the vaccine "destroys some of the healthiest people"? Chilling, but also sounds fabricated.
HostA: Yeah, the tone is just… off. Real researchers don’t talk like cartoon villains.
HostB: So maybe we take this dark web leak with a huge grain of salt. Or an entire salt mine.
